name: HoMeYePro
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart camera
Developer Terms of Use
des:
HoMeYePro is an IPC camera, you can securely monitor your home by using APP on smartphone or web on PC.

Now, with the skill HoMeYePro you can PTZ dome your cameras and camera stream by voice.

HOW TO GET CONNECTED:
1. Search the "HoMeYePro" skill on Alexa app
2. Tap the 'Enable' button
3. Enter your HoMeYePro account and password to link your HoMeYePro account
4. Select a camera to bind
5.After your HoMeYePro account has been successfully linked. Talk to your Echo and say, "Alexa, show camera".

TIPS: To use this skill, you need to specify the name and password of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the HoMeYePro App.

LIST OF COMMANDS:
- Alexa, show camera
